DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety DP-R207 patient primary hypercholesterolemia .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy/Safety DP-R207 Tablet Versus CRESTOR Tablet Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Aged 19 year Signed informed consent form At visit 1 visit 2 , LDLCholesterol ≤ 250mg/dL Triglyderide ≤ 350mg/dL Has history hypersensitivity HMGCoA reductase inhibitor component ezeimibe Liver transaminases > 2 x upper limit normal
